mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider improving touch targets for better accessibility and enhancing readability on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and consider lazy loading to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Ensure all pages have unique meta descriptions and utilize header tags effectively to improve visibility in search engines.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the navigation menu to make it more intuitive and user-friendly.
bookingFlowTip: Improve error validation in the booking form to provide clearer feedback to users.
tips: Ensure all forms are mobile-friendly and accessible
